product_name: Moving Comfort Work It Shorts - Women's
long_description: Stay dry and comfortable in the Moving Comfort Work It shorts. Performance fabric delivers comfort for running and a broad range of activities. Moisture-wicking and quick-drying fabric offers high performance and UPF 50+ protection; moisture-wicking, quick-drying liner briefs enhance comfort. Wide waistband with drawcord dials in the fit, and convertible drawcord can be tied on the inside or the outside. Side pockets shelter hands and internal waistband pocket stashes a key. The semifitted Work It shorts from Moving Comfort move with you during workouts without binding.
short_description: Stay dry and comfortable in the Moving Comfort Work It shorts. Performance fabric delivers comfort for running and a broad range of activities.
